name: sourceSystem
description: The source system that generated the event (e.g., 'Hubspot').

name: entity
description: The entity type related to the event (e.g., 'Product', 'Contact').

name: key
description: The unique key used to identify the entity in the source system (e.g., 'hs_object_id').

name: properties
description: List of properties associated with the event (e.g., 'price', 'quantity').

name: version
description: Version of the event schema or entity.

name: notes
description: Additional notes or comments related to the event.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the event was created or received.

name: executionTime
description: The duration it took to create the event.

name: correlationId
description: A unique identifier to correlate related events across systems.

name: lastCacheTimestamp
description: The timestamp when the event's cache was last updated.

name: lastCacheId
description: The unique identifier for the event cache record.

name: operation
description: The type of operation that triggered the event (e.g., 'create', 'update', 'delete').

name: entityId
description: The unique identifier of the entity related to the event (e.g., '12345').

name: data
description: The current state of the entity after the event occurred (e.g., 'active', 'inactive').

name: previousState
description: The previous state of the entity before the event occurred (e.g., 'inactive', 'active').
